resources.string: Shri Jagdishprasad Jhabarmal Tibrewala University has been established by a State Legislative Act of Rajasthan under No. F2/5/vidhi2 of 2009. It has commenced its academic operations including Research in the year 2009-2010. The University has set up sufficient infrastructure including laboratories, sports complex, library, yoga therapy center etc. Two batches of management course & two batches of engineering course have passed out and good number of Research Scholars have completed their Ph.D course.The University undertakes Ph.D course strictly as per UGC norms 2009 .The University has also conducted three Annual Convocations and two Special Convocations successfully. All thesis undergo plagiarism check and the thesis is accepted for evaluation only when the plagiarized work is within the acceptable limit. The University supports education of under-privileged students to complete their higher studies.The University also supports the financially weak schools in Jhunjhunu and other social welfare schemes.The University provides 75% exemption to girl students in academic courses. The University has organized more then 100 Conferences- National/International & Workshops.The University had organized International Conference in Colombo(Sri Lanka) in 2016 and in Dubai 2017. The University is publishing ISSN numbered Research Journals with Impact Factor.
